page_content:
Leicestershire Health Informatics Service

LHIS PaaS

Provides a fully managed best in class enterprise offering. The service provides fully managed server instances delivered to the customer preconfigured with a range of operating systems, antivirus configured, critical patches installed and back up routines in place. This is complemented by LHIS fast resilient N3 and internet network links.

Features

  • Fully managed server instances
  • Service reporting, ITIL management, planning
  • Physically secured multiple perimeters
  • Verification of backup’s success/failure
  • Retention and storage to match customer requirements
  • Fast resilient N3, PSN and internet network links
  • Server deployment Design, Build, Test, Migrate, Release
  • Antivirus configuration
  • File/Server restoration and recovery
  • Daily backups (standard 14 days)

Benefits

  • Managed operating system patching and security updates
  • UK hosted data centres
  • Experienced certified engineering team
  • Backed by Service Level Agreement (SLA)
  • Fully staffed service desk for logging issues and changes
  • Flexibility of configuration and service level
  • In house technical assurance services available

Pricing

£2480 per server per year

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial option available
